method6d.title: The 6D Navigation System
method6d.subtitle: Six clinical vectors of coherence for complex comorbidities and severe cases
method6d.description: A map, not a protocol. A system of diagnostic mapping and navigation that builds an individual coherence recovery pathway for each patient. Each dimension (D) answers a key question about the system's condition and identifies the 'bottleneck'.

dimensions.name: D1: Diagnosis
dimensions.subtitle: Evidence-Based Medical Diagnosis
dimensions.description: Evidence-based medical diagnosis (ICD, ICF, EBM). Creating a functional map of dysfunctions and system resources, beyond a single diagnostic label. Foundation for personalized recovery pathway.

dimensions.name: D2: Dysfunction
dimensions.subtitle: Pattern Correction
dimensions.description: Recognition and correction of maladaptive patterns that have become the system's default and block recovery. Breathing and movement patterns, myofascial release, postural correction. Essential for multi-system dysfunction and complex pain syndromes.

dimensions.name: D3: Disconnection
dimensions.subtitle: Brain-Body Reconnection
dimensions.description: Restoring brain-body connection and expanding the nervous system's 'window of tolerance'. Breaking free from chronic hyperactivation (anxiety, panic) or hypoactivation (apathy, dissociation). Coherent breathing, vagal activation, somatic grounding.

dimensions.name: D4: Direction
dimensions.subtitle: Biochemical Foundation
dimensions.description: Creating optimal internal environment for nervous system function and tissue regeneration through nutrition, nutraceuticals, and chronobiology. Personalized anti-inflammatory nutrition, circadian rhythm optimization. Biochemical support for system recovery.

dimensions.name: D5: Development
dimensions.subtitle: Cognitive Reprogramming
dimensions.description: Recognizing and changing maladaptive cognitive-behavioral programs that sustain the vicious cycle of pain, anxiety, and avoidance. Pain Neuroscience Education, ACT, cognitive therapy. Breaking neural circuits of catastrophization.

dimensions.name: D6: Depth
dimensions.subtitle: Life Integration
dimensions.description: Transition from 'I am being treated' to 'this is now my way of living'. Integrating practices into identity, creating supportive environment and social connections. Rituals, mindful movement, existential reevaluation. Relapse prevention and long-term stability.

items.question: Who is Medicine of Coherence for?
items.answer: For patients with severe comorbidities and complex cases where standard diagnostics show 'normal' results but symptoms persist. Especially for multi-system dysfunction, treatment-resistant conditions, and cases that don't fit standard diagnostic categories. Online consultations available across Europe.

items.question: What results can I expect?
items.answer: Our patients with severe, long-standing comorbidities achieve 70-85% symptom reduction. Results depend on case complexity and your engagement in the process.

items.question: How does 6D diagnostic work?
items.answer: 6D diagnostic assesses six dimensions of your health: physical, bioenergetic, emotional, mental, social, and integrative. It includes comprehensive analysis of comorbidities, biochemical markers, HRV measurement, and systemic assessment that reveals what standard tests miss.

items.question: Where do consultations take place?
items.answer: All consultations are conducted online via secure Zoom, available across Europe. For patients near Piešťany and Bratislava, personal contact is also possible.

items.question: Is my data secure?
items.answer: Yes, all data is processed in accordance with GDPR. We use encrypted communication and all cases are anonymized.

finalCta.title: Ready to find a solution for your complex case?
finalCta.subtitle: Start with online 6D diagnostic — the first step to understanding severe comorbidities that standard tests don't see.

testimonials.title: Patient Testimonials
testimonials.subtitle: Real results from patients with complex comorbidities across Europe and worldwide
testimonials.disclaimer: All cases are anonymized in accordance with GDPR. Results may vary depending on individual circumstances.

1.quote: 12 years of chronic pain. 15+ specialists couldn't help. All tests 'normal', but I was suffering. Dr. Erkin found the systemic cause in 90 minutes: chest breathing (18 cycles/min instead of 12), vitamin D deficiency (22 instead of 50+), weak gluteal muscles. In 6 weeks, pain dropped from 7/10 to 2/10. Most importantly - I understood WHY.

2.quote: 7 years without clear diagnosis. Each specialist treated separately. Everyone said 'not my area'. Dr. Erkin's 6D diagnostic revealed the connection: chronic stress → sympathetic dominance → gut dysfunction → inflammation. Online via Zoom worked perfectly. Finally understood what's happening.

3.quote: Burnout + chronic fatigue + pain everywhere. 5 years. Endocrinologist said 'hormones normal'. Neurologist prescribed antidepressants. Dr. Erkin's approach: adrenal recovery + circadian rhythms + vagus activation. After CRP-30 program, I sleep normally for the first time in years. Energy returned.

4.quote: 10 years of pain. Every doctor: 'It's psychosomatic, see a therapist'. But pain was REAL. Dr. Erkin didn't dismiss it. Brain-body reconnection + breathing + somatic work. Pain reduced from 8/10 to 2/10. Most important: I'm not 'broken'. My nervous system just needed reset.

5.quote: 8 years searching for answers. 20+ doctors, countless tests, all 'normal'. Found Dr. Erkin through Academia.edu publication. His 6D approach finally made sense: HRV showed sympathetic overdrive, breath pattern dysfunctional, magnesium severely depleted. 12 weeks later - different person. Working online from US was seamless.

6.quote: Long COVID left me with severe fatigue and brain fog. Doctors said 'it takes time, be patient'. After 2 years of waiting, found Dr. Erkin. His approach: mitochondrial support, HRV training, vagal tone restoration. Within 8 weeks, brain fog cleared 80%, energy improved dramatically. Can work full-time again.

7.quote: Chronic migraines 15 days/month + IBS. Tried everything: medications, Botox, exclusion diets. Nothing worked long-term. Dr. Erkin's 6D approach connected the dots: gut-brain axis dysfunction, vagal nerve impairment. After 3 months: migraines down to 3 days/month, IBS 90% better. Understanding the SYSTEM changed everything.

8.quote: Back surgery didn't help - pain actually got worse. Surgeon suggested second operation. Desperate, found Dr. Erkin online. His assessment: surgery addressed structure, ignored dysfunctional movement patterns and nervous system sensitization. Non-surgical approach: movement retraining + pain neuroscience education. 6 months later: pain 7/10 to 2/10. Avoided second surgery.
